name: Acid Reflux
effectText: Acid Reflux deals damage to the opposing team or the user's ally and inflicts the Poisoned Condition for 2 turns.

name: Allergic Spread
effectText: Allergic Spread deals damage to the opposing team or the user's ally.

name: Antitoxins
effectText: Antitoxins removes the Poisoned Condition from the target team.

name: Aqua Bullet Hell
effectText: Aqua Bullet Hell deals damage to a single target.

name: Aqua Stone
effectText: Aqua Stone deals damage to a single target.

name: Aquatic Whirlwind
effectText: Aquatic Whirlwind deals damage to a single target.

name: Autodestruction
effectText: Autodestruction deals damage to a single target.

name: Awful Song
effectText: Awful Song deals damage to a single target.

name: Bamboozle
effectText: Bamboozle gives the target the Evading Condition for 2 turns.

name: Bark
effectText: Bark gives the target DEF and SPDEF .

name: Bark Shield
effectText: Bark Shield gives each Temtem on the target team DEF

name: Base Jump
effectText: Base Jump deals damage to a single target.

name: Bestial Charge
description: A primal charge, like the stampede on the Kisiwa plains! It inflicts damage on the whole team.
effectText: Bestial Charge deals damage to the opposing team or the user's ally.

name: Beta Burst
effectText: Beta Burst deals damage to a single target.

name: Blizzard
effectText: Blizzard deals damage to a single target.

name: Block
effectText: Block gives the user DEF .

name: Boomerang
effectText: Boomerang deals damage to a single target.

name: Brace
effectText: Brace causes the user to gain the Evading Condition for 2 turns if it already has the Alerted Condition.

name: Bubbles
effectText: Bubbles deals damage to a single target.

name: Burrow
effectText: Burrow gives the Evading Condition to the user for 4 turns.

name: Bush
effectText: Bush gives Regenerated Condition and Evading Condition for 1 turn.

name: Cage
effectText: Cage inflicts all Temtem on the battlefield with the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Chain Heal
effectText: Chain Heal heals 20% of health of the target and the two successive targets in a clockwise order. When only two tems are on the battlefield, the initial target will heal 40% of health while 20% for the remaining target.

name: Chain Lightning
effectText: Chain Lightning damages a single target 100% of damage value and two successive Temtems 70% and 60% located clockwise respectively, unless any Temtem in the damage range blocks damage and stops the damage from passing on. Damage can be blocked if the target or other Temtem in the chain have the Evading Condition, has the trait Electric Synthesize or, if the target is an ally, has the Friendship trait.

name: Chains Hit
effectText: Chains Hit deals damage to a single target.

name: Charge
effectText: Charge deals damage to a single target.

name: Cheer Up
effectText: Cheer Up reduces the Hold of all techniques of the target by 1 as if an additional turn had gone by.

name: Clay Ball
effectText: Clay Ball deals damage to a single target.

name: Clinch
effectText: Clinch deals damage to a single target.

name: Cold Breeze
effectText: Cold Breeze deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Cold Condition for 3 turns.

name: Cold Geyser
effectText: Cold Geyser deals damage to a single target and gives them the Cold Condition for 2 turns.

name: Confiscate
effectText: Confiscate inflicts a single target with the Seized Condition for 3 turns.

name: Cooperation
effectText: Cooperation takes the target team's current total STA and splits it evenly between the target team's Temtem.

name: Crystal Bite
effectText: Crystal Bite deals damage to a single target.

name: Crystal Dust
effectText: Crystal Dust deals damage to a single target.

name: Crystal Plume Gatling
effectText: Crystal Plume Gatling deals damage to a single target.

name: Crystal Spikes
effectText: Crystal Spikes deals damage to a single target.

name: Crystal Stream
effectText: Crystal Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Crystallize
effectText: Crystallize gives the user DEF but SPD .

name: Darkness
effectText: Darkness gives the Isolated Condition to all Temtem on the battlefield for 2 turns.

name: Data Burst
effectText: Currently, Data Burst is unavailable, so its unknown what it's full effect is.

name: DC Beam
effectText: DC Beam deals damage to a single target.

name: Diamond Fort
effectText: Diamond Fort gives the user DEF and SPDEF .

name: Digital Stream
effectText: Digital Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Dim Mak
effectText: Dim Mak deals an exact, consistent 80 damage to a single target, regardless of DEF, SPDEF, type resistances, or traits. This will not wake up a Temtem with the Asleep Condition.

name: Double Edge
effectText: Double Edge deals damage to the target and gives it DEF and SPDEF .

name: Double Gash
effectText: Double Gash does damage to a single target.

name: Double Kick
effectText: Double Kick deals damage to a single target.

name: Drill Impact
effectText: Drill Impact deals damage to a single target.

name: Drought
effectText: Drought causes all Temtem to get the Exhausted Condition, and 2 turns, and leaves the user overexerted next turn.

name: Dust Vortex
effectText: Dust Vortex deals damage to a single target.

name: Earth Stream
effectText: Earth Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Earth Wave
effectText: Earth Wave deals damage to the opposing team or the user's ally.

name: Earthbreaker
effectText: Earthbreaker deals damage to a single target.

name: Electric Storm
effectText: Electric Storm deals damage to the opposing team or the user's ally.

name: Electric Stream
effectText: Electric Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Electromagnitism
effectText: Currently, Electromagnitism is unobtainable, so it's unknown what its full effect is.

name: Electropunch
effectText: Electropunch deals damage to a single target.

name: Embers
effectText: Embers deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Burned Condition for 1 turn.

name: Energy Manipulation
effectText: Energy Manipulation deals damage to a single target and inflicts the Exhausted Condition for 1 turn.

name: Execution
effectText: Execution deals damage to a single target. If this damage would put it below 40% of its maximum HP, it instead is knocked-out.

name: Extinction
effectText: Extinction inflicts every Temtem on the battlefield with a 4 turn countdown of the Doomed Condition.

name: Extra Energy Slam
effectText: Currently, Extra Energy Slam is unavailable, so it's unknown what its full effect is.

name: Feather Gatling
effectText: Feather Gatling deals damage to a single target.

name: Fierce Claw
effectText: Fierce Claw deals damage to a single target.

effectText: Fire Flame deals damage to a single target.

name: Fire Tornado
effectText: Fire Tornado deals damage to a single target.

name: Firewall
effectText: Currently, Firewall is unavailable, so it is unknown what it's full effect is.

name: Flaming Meteorite
effectText: Flaming Meteorite deals damage to a single target.

name: Flood
effectText: Flood gives the enemies team's or ally's SPD

name: Footwork
effectText: Footwork gives the user SPD .

name: Frond Whip
effectText: Frond Whip deals damage to a single target.

name: Gaia
effectText: Gaia restores the user's STA to full. The user will still overexert if they lack the required stamina before use.

name: Gamma Burst
effectText: Gamma Burst deals damage to a single target and gives it the Exhausted Condition for 2 turns.

name: Glass Blade
effectText: Glass Blade deals damage to a single target.

name: Goring
effectText: Goring deals damage to a single target.

name: Haito Uchi
effectText: Haito Uchi deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Asleep Condition for 1 turn.

name: Hallucination
effectText: Hallucination inflicts the target with the Exhausted Condition and the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Harmful Lick
effectText: Harmful Lick deals damage to a single target.

name: Head Charge
effectText: Head Charge deals damage to a single target.

name: Head Ram
effectText: Head Ram deals damage to a single target.

name: Heat Up
effectText: Heat Up gives the user ATK .

name: Heavy Blow
effectText: Heavy Blow deals damage to a single target.

name: Held Anger
effectText: Held Anger deals damage to a single target.

name: Hellfire
effectText: Hellfire deals damage to the opposing team or the user's ally.

name: Hibernate
effectText: Hibernate inflicts the user with the Frozen Condition for 3 turns but restores 40% of its maximum HP and STA.

name: High-pressure Water
effectText: High-pressure Water deals damage to a single target.

name: Hook Kick
effectText: Hook Kick deals damage to a single target.

name: Humiliating Slap
effectText: Humiliating Slap deals damage to a single target and gives them DEF

name: Hyperkinetic Strike
effectText: Hyperkinetic Strike deals damage to a single target.

name: Hypnosis
effectText: Hypnosis inflicts a single target with the Asleep Condition for 2 turns.

name: Hypoxia
effectText: Hypoxia deals damage to a single target.

name: Ice Cubes
effectText: Ice Cubes deals damage to a single target.

name: Ice Shuriken
effectText: Ice Shuriken deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Cold Condition for 2 turns.

name: Iced Stalactite
effectText: Iced Stalactite deals damage to a single target and inflicts it with the Cold Condition for 3 turns.

name: Inner Spirit
effectText: Inner Spirit deals damage to a single target.

name: Intimidation
effectText: Intimidation inflicts the opposing team or an ally with the Exhausted Condition for 2 turns.

name: Jaw Strike
description: Temtem with powerful jaws always know how to use them...
effectText: Jaw Strike deals damage to a single target.

name: Kick
effectText: Kick deals damage to a single target.

name: King's Roar
effectText: King's Roar gives the targets SPD and ATK .

name: Late Torment
description: The first cut is the deepest, but the last one hurts like Downbelow. This Neutral Technique only works on trapped enemies and inflicts 180 damage.
effectText: Late Torment deals damage to a single target if it has the Trapped Condition.

name: Lifeful Sap
description: The sap of life, from the living heart of the Giant Banyan. Heals 10% HP for 7 turns.
effectText: Lifeful Sap applies the Regenerated Condition to the user for 7 turns.

name: Look out
description: This Temtem has (metaphorical) eyes on the back of its head. This hyperalert state makes it alerted for 5 turns.
effectText: Look out gives the target the Alerted Condition for 5 turns.

name: Lullaby
description: Twinkle twinkle little Tem /Whole opponent team falls Asleep for 2 turns.
effectText: Lullaby inflicts the opposing team or the user's ally with the Asleep Condition for 2 turns.

name: Madness Buff
description: There is an edge to this madness - those willing to take 30% Damage will get SPDEF and SPATK .
effectText: Madness Buff causes the user lose 30% of their total HP and then gets SPDEF and SPATK .

name: Magma Cannon
description: Like a surge of Anak lava to the face! Fire technique that burns for 3 turns.
effectText: Magma Cannon deals damage to a single target and inflicts the Burned Condition for 3 turns.

name: Major Slash
description: This blow targets the enemy's weak spot for massive damage.
effectText: Major Slash deals damage to a single target.

name: Martial Strike
description: Many Melee Temtem are trained to perform this basic but effective technique.

name: Matter Teleport
description: Feels like being disintegrated into molecules - not nice. This Mental technique inflicts heavy damage.
effectText: Matter Teleport deals damage to a single target.

name: Mechanical Heat
description: Currently, Mechanical Heat is unavailable, so its unknowns what it's description is.
effectText: Currently, Mechanical Heat is unavailable, so its unknown what it's full effect is.

name: Meditation
description: Sync your breathing, become more aware of the space around you, feel your body and mind get Vigorized for 3 turns...
effectText: Meditation give the user the Vigorized Condition for 3 turns.

name: Melee Stream
description: With strong muscles developed by swimming against the current, some Koish can do moderate Melee damage.
effectText: Melee Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Mental Stream
description: Related to ancient Cipanku river kami, this Koish has Mental powers that deliver moderate damage.
effectText: Mental Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Metabolize
description: This metabolic enhancement reacts to poison in the target's body by purging it and the caster recovers 15% of health.
effectText: If the target of Metabolize has the Poisoned Condition, it loses it and heals 15% of its maximum life.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: Death from above... A barrage of flaming meteorites that inflicts Fire damage on the whole team.
effectText: Meteor Swarm deals damage to the opposing team or an ally.

name: Mineral Hail
description: Imagine a Crystal storm in the darkest depths of Mictlan... Now just watch the enemy team.
effectText: Mineral Hail deals damage to a single team.

name: Mirror Shell
description: "Mirror, mirror in my hand, who's the best tamer in the Archipelago?" "No idea, but you get SPDEF ".
effectText: Mirror Shell gives the user SPDEF .

name: Misogi
description: The monks of Miyako developed this technique to eliminate all altered states on the Temtem.
effectText: Misogi removes all Status Conditions inflicted on the user.

name: Mud Shower
description: Some of the larger Temtem of the savannah love this Earth technique, as messy as it is fun!
effectText: Mud Shower deals damage to a single target.

name: Multiple Pecks
description: A rapid-fire flurry of furious beaks.
effectText: Multiple Pecks deals damage to a single target.

name: Nagaise's Fury
description: lä, lä! Nagaise is calling some Water friends from the deeps... The whole enemy team will regret this.
effectText: Nagaise's Fury deals damage to a single team.

name: Narcoleptic Hit
description: A potent attack that exhausts the attacker's psyche, making it Asleep for 2 turns.
effectText: Narcoleptic Hit deals damage to a single target and inflicts the user with the Asleep Condition for 2 turns.

name: Nature Stream
description: Koish that live in dense brackish waters can channel the power of Nature to inflict moderate damage.
effectText: Nature Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Neutral Stream
description: Cute but still fight-heavy. Koish know how to inflict moderate Neutral damage.
effectText: Neutral Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Nibble
description: Many Temtem have this habit of gently chewing plants and furniture. This is a little less gentle.
effectText: Nibble deals damage to a single target.

name: Nicho Sai
description: This basic strike for sai delivers a powerful Melee technique.
effectText: Nicho Sai deals damage to a single target.

name: Nimble
description: Through rigorous training, Temtem can become extra fast and gain SPD .
effectText: Nimble gives the target SPD .

name: Ninja Jutsu
description: The secret arts of the Cipanku shinobi! This technique lets you backstab enemies in the blink of an eye.
effectText: Ninja Jutsu deals damage to a single target.

name: Nito Seiho
description: Derived from Cipanki martial traditions, this technique deals a powerful Melee strike.
effectText: Nito Seiho deals damage to a single target.

name: Novice Punch
description: Just one step above a slap, but everybody's got to start somewhere.
effectText: Novice Punch deals damage to a single target.

name: Noxious Bomb
description: This nasty stinker inflicts Toxic damage... Just don't use it in an elevator...
effectText: Noxious Bomb deals damage to a single target.

name: Oshi-Dashi
description: Going for the ring out can be a dangerous Melee move in the smallest islands.
effectText: Oshi-Dashi deals damage to a single target.

name: Paralyzing Poison
description: This strong venom traps and poisons the target for 2 turns.
effectText: Paralyzing Poison inflicts the target with the Poisoned Condition and the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Peck
description: All beaked Temtems like to playfully peck their tamers. This is the less friendly version.
effectText: Peck deals damage to a single target.

name: Perfect Jab
description: Strike smarter, not harder. Weak, but enemy get DEF .
effectText: Perfect Jab deals damage to a single target and gives them DEF .

name: Petrify
description: Have a heart... of stone. It doesn't hurt much, but it leaves enemies for 5 turns.
effectText: Petrify deals damage to a single target and inflicts the Trapped Condition for 5 turns.

name: Photosynthesis
description: Nature Temtem are unique in their use of Pan-sunlight to nourish themselves and recover 50% STA.
effectText: Photosynthesis restores 50% of the user's total STA.

name: Pickpocket
description: A dirty trick from the seedier alleys of Lochburg, uses nimble fingers (or claws) to Seize the target for 2 turns.
effectText: Pickpocket deals damage to a single target and inflicts the Seized Condition for 2 turns.

name: Piercing Wheel
description: Zizare's signature technique - a fast attack that terrifies enemies DEF and lifts your spirits, giving you Vigor for 2 turns.
effectText: Piercing Wheel deals damage to a single target and gives it DEF , while also giving its user the Vigorized Condition for 2 turns.

name: Plague
description: A nasty lurgy that damages the target and leaves it Exhausted for 1 turn.
effectText: Plague deals damage to a single target and inflicts the Exhausted Condition for 1 turn.

name: Pollution
description: Noxious fumes, almost unheard-of in the unspoilt Archipelago. They Poison the whole team for 2 turns.
effectText: Pollution inflicts the opposing team or the user's ally with the Poisoned Condition for 2 turns.

name: Psy Surge
description: An enhanced version of Psy that inflicts so much psychological damage that it bleeds into the somatic.
effectText: Psy Surge deals damage to a single target.

name: Psy Wave
description: "Mens sana in corpore sano"... but the other way around.
effectText: Psy Wave deals damage to a single target.

name: Psychic Collaborator
description: This Mental technique does a meagre 1 damage... It's all in your mind, after all.
effectText: Psychic Collaborator deals damage to a single target with no additional effects.

name: Psychosis
description: Inflicts Doom for 4 turns.
effectText: Psychosis inflicts the target with a 4 turn countdown of the Doomed Condition.

name: Quartz Shield
description: Temtem found defensive uses for rock crystal centuries before humans did: DEF and SPDEF .
effectText: Quartz Shield gives the target DEF and SPDEF .

name: Quetza-leño
description: A party trick someone showed you once, involving a Fire Temtem, a log and a bottle of Quetzaleño Reposado...
effectText: Quetza-leño deals damage to a single target.

name: Quicksand
description: Can we all sink any lower? Every Temtem on the battlefield gets SPD .
effectText: Quicksand causes all Temtem to get SPD .

name: Rage
description: The red mist makes a Temtem brutal but also careless, getting ATK and DEF .
effectText: Rage gives the user ATK but also DEF .

name: Rainbow Guard
description: En garde! This technique makes you immune for 2 turns and makes you evade attacks for 1 turn.
effectText: Rainbow Guard causes the user to gain the Immune Condition for 2 turns and the Evading Condition for 1 turn.

name: Rampage
description: Temtem might be cute... but when they go on a Rampage, they inflict damage on the whole team.
effectText: Rampage deals damage to the target team.

name: Relax
description: Time for a little siesta! Everyone on the battlefield gets Asleep for 2 turns.
effectText: Relax inflicts every Temtem on the field with the Asleep Condition for 2 turns.

name: Rend
description: While this technique does only moderate damage, it Nullifies the target for 4 turns, buying you some precious time...
effectText: Rend deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Nullified Condition for 4 turns.

name: Resin Trap
description: Like a mosquito in amber, this technique damages an enemy and leaves it trapped for 2 turns.
effectText: Resin Trap deals damage to a single target and inflicts the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Revitalize
description: Antiseptic and a couple of bandages. Target recovers 25% HP.
effectText: Revitalize recovers 25% of the targets total HP.

name: Roar
description: A mighty roar at a crucial moment, to intimidate rivals for ATK .
effectText: Roar gives the targets ATK .

name: Rockfall
description: Avalanche! The whole enemy team is bombarded with rocky debris for massive damage.
effectText: Rockfall deals damage to a single team or an ally.

name: Roots
description: Legends tell of the Omninesian tamers who would root rivals in place, inflicting SPD .
effectText: Roots gives the target SPD .

name: Sacrifice
description: Temtem may pay the ultimate price to heal the target of all Status conditions and give them DEF and SPDEF .
effectText: Sacrifice causes the user to knock-out itself out then removes all Status Conditions from the target and give it DEF and SPDEF .

name: Sand Splatter
description: A fistful of humble sand becomes a faceful of dirty fighting.
effectText: Sand Splatter deals damage to a single target.

name: Sand Storm
description: Developed by the legendary tamer Da-Rud in ancient times, this Earth technique inflicts decent damage on the whole team.
effectText: Sand Storm deals damage to the opposing team or the user's ally.

name: Savage Suplex
description: In classic Temtem wresting showbiz style, this Neutral technique damages and the target for 2 turns.
effectText: Savage Suplex deals damage to a single target and inflicts the them with 2 turns of the Exhausted Condition.

name: Scratch
description: Almost any claw or nail can scratch the surface. Sometimes that's enough.
effectText: Scratch deals damage to a single target.

name: Seismunch's Wreck
description: Seismunch has exactly the balls to deal with the whole enemy team... Earth balls, that is.
effectText: Seismunch's Wreck deals damage to a single team or ally.

name: Serbatiyo's Wrath
description: Only Oceara can tap into the immense power of the mythical serbatiyo to unleash a devastating Water attack on the whole enemy team.
effectText: Serbatiyo's Wrath deals damage to the target team.

name: Sharp Leaf
description: Evolution has armed Nature Temtem with advanced defenses against herbivores.
effectText: Sharp Leaf deals damage to a single target.

name: Sharp Rain
description: Rather like snow, if snow was razor-sharp ice needles instead of gentle flakes.
effectText: Sharp Rain deals damage to a single target.

name: Sharp Stabs
description: Like winter in the Kilima peaks, this blizzard of sharp shards is as fast as piercing.
effectText: Sharp Stabs deals damage to a single target.

name: Shelter
description: Take cover! This slow technique gives DEF and SPDEF at the expense of leaving you Overexerted on the next turn.
effectText: Shelter gives the user DEF and SPDEF , while overexerting them the next turn.

name: Show Off
description: A good Melee fighter is a always a good showman: ATK .
effectText: Show Off gives the user ATK .

name: Shrill Voice
description: Widely used by Accademia teachers, this Neutral attack deafens the whole class... eh, team.
effectText: Shrill Voice deals damage to the targets.

name: Shy Shield
description: Some Temtem are naturally introverted and keep to themselves, obtaining DEF .
effectText: Shy Shield gives the user DEF .

name: Slime
description: Nothing slows you down like being swamped in sticky goo... Traps for 2 turns and gives SPD
effectText: Slime inflicts the Trapped Condition on the target for 2 turns and gives them SPD .

name: Sludge Gift
description: An extremely weak Earth technique... but you don't look a sludge gift in the rock, right?
effectText: Sludge Gift deals damage to a single target.

name: Smoldering Kiss
description: Ah, the crazy Fire of passion! The target gets just a little scorched, but the kisser is invigorated for 2 turns.
effectText: Smoldering Kiss deals damage to a single target, and gives the user the Vigorized Condition for 2 turns.

name: Sparks
description: Nothing perks you up like a spark-up! SPATK .
effectText: Sparks gives the target SPATK .

name: Spores
description: One of the most basic Nature attacks, based on allergenic spores.
effectText: Spores deals damage to a single target.

name: Stampede
description: A stampede worth of the Kisiwan savanna. Damages the whole team.
effectText: Stampede deals damage to a single team.

name: Stare
description: This Temtem's intimidating stare gives the Temtem Alert for 2 turns, and makes rivals feel more vulnerable: DEF .
effectText: Stare gives the target DEF and the user gains the Alerted Condition for 2 turns.

name: Sting
description: A tiny prick only hurts a little... until they notice they're for 2 turns.
effectText: Sting deals damage to a single target and gives it the Poisoned Condition for 2 turns.

name: Stone Ball
description: The bane of exploring archaeologists, this is a mighty Earth technique.
effectText: Stone Ball deals damage to a single target.

name: Stone Wall
description: The best way to stonewall a Temtem, giving DEF and SPDEF .
effectText: Stone Wall gives the target DEF and SPDEF .

name: Strangle
description: Strangler and strangled, united in a deadly embrace. Both attacker and target lose their next turn as long as they are present in the field, while the attacker not asleep.
effectText: Strangle deals damage to a single target and causes both the user and the target to become overexerted for the next turn.

name: Tail Strike
description: Sweep the board at one fell swoop.
effectText: Tail Strike deals damage to a single target.

name: Telekinetic Shrapnel
description: Reportedly feels "like combing your brain with concertina wire."
effectText: Telekinetic Shrapnel deals damage to a single target.

name: Tenderness
description: Really? Are you going to attack something *this* cute? Inflicts ATK .
effectText: Tenderness gives the target ATK .

name: Tentacle Whip
description: Tentacles. Why did it have to be tentacles?
effectText: Tentacle Whip deals damage to a single target.

name: Tesla Prison
description: An electromagnetic trap that does light damage and slows down the target: SPD .
effectText: Tesla Prison deals damage to a single target and gives it SPD .

name: Thunder Strike
description: Hear it roar! The sound and fury of this technique inflict heavy damage but Exhaust the attacker for 2 turns.
effectText: Thunder Strike deals damage to a single target, but gives the user the Exhausted Condition for 2 turns.

name: Time Split
description: Twist the fabric of time-space to your advantage, gaining SPD and giving the enemy SPD .
effectText: Time Split deals damage to a single target, gives it SPD , and gives the user SPD .

name: Tornado
description: A powerful wind technique, illegal to use near all airship terminals of the Archipelago.
effectText: Tornado deals damage to a single target.

name: Tortenite's Garden
description: Lil' Tort just wanted to play in its garden... but it won't suffer intruders! You heal 10% while the target is Doomed for 4 turns.
effectText: Tortenite's Garden heals the user for 10% of its maximum HP and gives the target the Doomed Condition for 4 turns.

name: Toughen
description: When the going gets tough, the tough get going - and DEF !
effectText: Toughen gives the user DEF .

name: Toxic Fang
description: A quick nibble that doesn't look like much... until you notice the Poison for 1 turn.
effectText: Toxic Fang deals damage to a single target and inflicts 1 turn of the Poisoned Condition.

name: Toxic Gas
description: Hold your nose when you unleash this Toxic attack on the whole team.
effectText: Toxic Gas deals damage to a single team.

name: Toxic Ink
description: The victim will have time to regret getting this tattoo... While it's Poisoned for 2 turns.
effectText: Toxic Ink deals damage to a single target and inflicts 2 turns of the Poisoned Condition.

name: Toxic Plume
description: Like a faulty airship engine, this Temtem can leave a trail of toxic gas that gives Poison to the whole team for 1 turn.
effectText: Toxic Plume does damage to a single team and gives them the Poisoned Condition for 1 turn.

name: Toxic Slime
description: This takes the form of a repulsive wave of slime that hurts the body... and your self-esteem.
effectText: Toxic Slime deals damage to a single target.

name: Toxic Spores
description: Toxin-carrying spores that inoculate with Poisoned Condition for 3 turns.
effectText: Toxic Spores inflicts a single target with 3 turns of the Poisoned Condition

name: Toxic Stream
description: Condensing waterborne toxins, Koish can use a stream of Toxic fluid that inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Toxic Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Toxin Shower
description: "Toxinestorm" isn't as colorful as the alternative, but you get the idea... Slightly damages all Temtem in the battlefield.
effectText: Toxin Shower deals damage to all targets on the battlefield.

name: Tsunami
description: "Summon a rarely seen tidal wave that damages a whole team."
effectText: Tsunami deals damage to the opposing team or the user's ally.

name: Turbo Attack
description: Currently, Turbo Attack is unavailable, so its unknown what it's description is.
effectText: Currently, Turbo Attack is unavailable, so its unknown what it's full effect is.

name: Turbo Charge
description: Turn it to eleven! Decreases the Hold level of our whole team.
effectText: Turbo Charge lowers the target team's Hold of all techniques by 1.

name: Turbo Choreography
description: The ancestral dance of Deniz is a powerful ritual that bestows protection, SPD to the whole team.
effectText: Turbo Choreography gives the target team SPD .

name: Undermine
description: Leave your opponent heavily damaged and treading on very thin ice, giving it SPATK .
effectText: Undermine deals damage to the opposing Temtem or the user's ally.

name: Untangle
description: With a few swift movement, this technique Untraps the target from any tangle.
effectText: Untangle removes the from the target.

name: Uppercut
description: Melee Temtem are all about raw strength. This technique is its sincerest expression.
effectText: Uppercut deals damage to a single target.

name: Urushiol
description: The substance known as Urushiol is a virulent toxic agent.

name: Venom Spread
description: This technique only works on already poisoned enemies - but in that case, the toxin rush inflicts 150 damage.
effectText: Venom Spread deals damage to a single target if it has the Poisoned Condition.

name: Venomous Claws
description: When the look of your claws doesn't prevent the fight, the poison finishes it.
effectText: Venomous Claws deals damage to a single target.

name: Wake Up
description: "Wake up and smell the coffee! Inflicts minimal damage but wakes up the target instantly."
effectText: Wake Up deals damage to a single target.

name: Warm Cuddle
description: Some Temtem are so warm and cuddly that they can weaponize that love into a Fire technique.
effectText: Warm Cuddle deals damage to a single target.

name: Wastewater
description: Like raw sewage raining on you, without the "like", it inflicts moderate Toxic damage and poisons for 2 turns.
effectText: Wastewater deals damage to a single target and gives it the for 2 turns.

name: Water Blade
description: Whipping seawater, like the stormy Sillaro lashing at the cliffs.
effectText: Water Blade deals damage to a single target.

name: Water Cannon
description: The strongest Sillaro current has nothing on this unstoppable jet.
effectText: Water Cannon deals damage to a single target.

name: Water Cutting Lily
description: As pretty than Denizan Water lilies... but much deadlier.
effectText: Water Cutting Lily deals damage to a single target.

name: Water Stream
description: Like manyWater Temtem, Koish can use jets of water to inflict moderate damage.
effectText: Water Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Waterjet
description: About time your enemies took a shower! This pressurized jet inflicts considerable damage and leaves the target Cold for 2 turns.
effectText: Waterjet deals damage to a single target and gives them the Cold Condition for 2 turns.

name: Willpower Drain
description: Sapping the very will to fight from an enemy's mind, this quick Neutral technique steals 23 Stamina points.
effectText: Willpower Drain removes 23 STA from the target, while the user gains 23 STA.

name: Wind Blade
description: Lashing gales, like the frozen tramontane howling over Loch.
effectText: Wind Blade deals damage to a single target.

name: Wind Burst
description: A terrifying gust of wind, capable of throwing a small airship off-course.
effectText: Wind Burst deals damage to a single target.

name: Wind Stream
description: This Koish variety, probably from Deniz, can inflict moderate Wind damage.
effectText: Wind Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Winter Call
description: A wintry sonata that leaves all Temtem in the battlefield as Cold as the Kilima snows.
effectText: Winter Call inflicts Cold Condition on all targets on the battlefield for 2 turns.
